item.title: COVID-19's impact on medical malpractice cases
item.description: I keep reading a lot online or in the media about how some are expecting a delusion of medical malpractice lawsuits arriving from COVID-19 care. I’ve told everyone whoâ€™s asked me that I don’t see that happening. Competent, experienced medical malpractice lawyers in Texas realize that one requirement to pursue any medical malpractice case is to produce expert testimony that defines the applicable standard of care. Generally speaking, the standard of care is what a reasonably prudent hospital/doctor/health care provider would have done under the same or similar circumstances.
